title: 你来为我送行真是太好了

conversations.english: Nick, it's very nice of you to see me off.尼克，你来为我送行真是太好了。
conversations.chinese: 尼克，你来为我送行真是太好了。
conversations.reply_english: You're welcome. Did you have a good time on this vacation?我非常乐意，你假期过得愉快吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 我非常乐意，你假期过得愉快吗？

conversations.english: What was your wedding ceremony like, Abigail?盖布莉加尔，你们的结婚典礼怎么样？
conversations.chinese: 盖布莉加尔，你们的结婚典礼怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: My husband and I got married in a registry office with just two friends there as witnesses. But then we had three parties to celebrate.我和我丈夫请了2个朋友做见证人，去婚姻注册处注了册。可是，接着我们要办3场酒席。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我和我丈夫请了2个朋友做见证人，去婚姻注册处注了册。可是，接着我们要办3场酒席。

conversations.english: Tom, you look thoughtful and unhappy recently. What's wrong with you?汤姆，你最近看起来总是若有所思，又很不开心。你是怎么了？
conversations.chinese: 汤姆，你最近看起来总是若有所思，又很不开心。你是怎么了？
conversations.reply_english: Lily broke up with me last week. In fact, she dumped me.上周莉莉和我分手了。确切地说，是她甩了我。
conversations.reply_chinese: 上周莉莉和我分手了。确切地说，是她甩了我。

title: 不要害怕开始一段新的感情

conversations.english: Annie, what is troubling you? You look unhappy.安妮，你在烦恼什么呢？你看起来不太开心。
conversations.chinese: 安妮，你在烦恼什么呢？你看起来不太开心。
conversations.reply_english: A man is pursuing me. He was my schoolmate in college, and he has been carrying a torch for me for three years.有个人在追求我。他是我大学时的同学，已经单恋了我3年。
conversations.reply_chinese: 有个人在追求我。他是我大学时的同学，已经单恋了我3年。

conversations.english: Julia, will you be my wife?茱莉亚，你愿意成为我的妻子吗？
conversations.chinese: 茱莉亚，你愿意成为我的妻子吗？
conversations.reply_english: I'm sorry, Steven.我很抱歉，史蒂文。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我很抱歉，史蒂文。

conversations.english: Hi Mary, how's it going?玛丽,最近怎么样?
conversations.chinese: 玛丽,最近怎么样?
conversations.reply_english: Well, last night I had a big argument with Ann.哎,昨晚我和安大吵了一架.
conversations.reply_chinese: 哎,昨晚我和安大吵了一架.

title: 妻子的死对我打击很大

conversations.english: I feel very miserable. I took the death of my wife very hard, you know.我沮丧极了，我妻子的死对我打击很大。
conversations.chinese: 我沮丧极了，我妻子的死对我打击很大。
conversations.reply_english: Cheer up! Let bygones be bygones.振作点儿！过去的事情就让它过去吧。
conversations.reply_chinese: 振作点儿！过去的事情就让它过去吧。

conversations.english: It's a lovely day, isn't it?今天天气不错,是吧?
conversations.chinese: 今天天气不错,是吧?
conversations.reply_english: Yeah, and most excitingly, I met the girl living under me today. She's really nice.嗯,而且令人激动的是,我今天见到了楼下的女孩!我觉得她人很好.
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯,而且令人激动的是,我今天见到了楼下的女孩!我觉得她人很好.

conversations.english: Lily thinks that the job takes a back seat to the family after she is married.Lily认为结婚后家庭为先，工作处于次要地位。
conversations.chinese: Lily认为结婚后家庭为先，工作处于次要地位。
conversations.reply_english: She must be a good wife.她一定是一个好妻子。
conversations.reply_chinese: 她一定是一个好妻子。

title: 约翰一周内约了她七次

conversations.english: John dates her seven times a week.约翰一周内约了她七次。
conversations.chinese: 约翰一周内约了她七次。
conversations.reply_english: Really? That's a straws in the wind.真的吗？这可是一种迹象。
conversations.reply_chinese: 真的吗？这可是一种迹象。

conversations.english: I wonder how Sarah and Mat are.我想知道莎拉和马特的情况怎么样了。
conversations.chinese: 我想知道莎拉和马特的情况怎么样了。
conversations.reply_english: Don't you know they've already broken up?你不知道他们已经分手了吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 你不知道他们已经分手了吗？

title: 你穿上那件礼服看起来很傻

conversations.english: Jimmy, I’d like to wear this robe for tonight cocktail party. What do you think of it?吉米，我想穿这件礼服去参加今晚的鸡尾酒派对。你觉得怎样？
conversations.chinese: 吉米，我想穿这件礼服去参加今晚的鸡尾酒派对。你觉得怎样？
conversations.reply_english: Don’t dress like that. You’ll make fool yourself. You look stupid in that robe.不要那样穿。你会闹笑话的。你穿上那件礼服看起来很傻。
conversations.reply_chinese: 不要那样穿。你会闹笑话的。你穿上那件礼服看起来很傻。

title: 抓她的把柄 Get the goods on her

conversations.english: I’m sure you never dare to go against your wife.我敢肯定你从来不敢不听老婆的。
conversations.chinese: 我敢肯定你从来不敢不听老婆的。
conversations.reply_english: Why should I go against her? She always seems to have better ideas.我为何要不听她的。好像一直都是她的主意好些。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我为何要不听她的。好像一直都是她的主意好些。

title: Dan离婚了 Dan got a divorce

conversations.english: You know that? Dan got a divorce.你知道吗？Dan离婚了。
conversations.chinese: 你知道吗？Dan离婚了。
conversations.reply_english: Really? I thought he loved his wife very much.真的吗？我还以为她很爱他的妻子了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 真的吗？我还以为她很爱他的妻子了。

title: 我跟我丈夫吵架了 I quarreled with my husband

conversations.english: When I quarrel with my husband. He didn't evern try to cool me out.我和丈夫吵架的时候，他连理都不理我。
conversations.chinese: 我和丈夫吵架的时候，他连理都不理我。
conversations.reply_english: It takes two to make a quarrel and it takes two to memd fences.吵架和和好是双方面的事情。
conversations.reply_chinese: 吵架和和好是双方面的事情。

title: 她根本就不爱她的丈夫

conversations.english: I heard that Ann had divorced.我听说Ann离婚了。
conversations.chinese: 我听说Ann离婚了。
conversations.reply_english: I suspect it's unavoidable.我料想这是不可避免的。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我料想这是不可避免的。

title: 婚姻幸福得两个人共同努力

conversations.english: I cannot ignore her suggestion. In fact I always value her suggestion.我没法对她的建议置之不理，实际上我总是很重视她的意见的。
conversations.chinese: 我没法对她的建议置之不理，实际上我总是很重视她的意见的。
conversations.reply_english: I know. Maybe you will get the air if you go against her.我知道你要是不听她的可能就会被甩掉的。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我知道你要是不听她的可能就会被甩掉的。

conversations.english: Would you mind going to dinner with me tonight?你今晚一起去吃饭如何？
conversations.chinese: 你今晚一起去吃饭如何？
conversations.reply_english: I'd love to go out with you, but I'm sorry I'm busy tonight, but I'd like a rain check.我很愿意和你出去。可是非常抱歉我今晚有事。我们下次去，好吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 我很愿意和你出去。可是非常抱歉我今晚有事。我们下次去，好吗？

conversations.english: Hello?喂？
conversations.chinese: 喂？
conversations.reply_english: Hi, Randy. What are you doing right now?嘿，Randy，你在做什么呢？
conversations.reply_chinese: 嘿，Randy，你在做什么呢？

conversations.english: Hello?喂？
conversations.chinese: 喂？
conversations.reply_english: Hi, Randy. What are you going to do this weekend?嘿，Randy，你周末有什么安排？
conversations.reply_chinese: 嘿，Randy，你周末有什么安排？

title: 有兴趣去中餐馆吃午饭吗？

conversations.english: Hello?喂？
conversations.chinese: 喂？
conversations.reply_english: Hi, Kathy. Have you had lunch?嘿，Kathy，你吃过午饭了吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 嘿，Kathy，你吃过午饭了吗？

title: 那我们约别的时间吃午饭

conversations.english: Hello?喂？
conversations.chinese: 喂？
conversations.reply_english: Hi, Shelley. Have you had lunch?嘿，Shelley，吃过午饭了吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 嘿，Shelley，吃过午饭了吗？

title: 杰克上个月离婚了Jack got divorced

conversations.english: Do you know that Jack got divorced last month.你知不知道，杰克上个月离婚了。
conversations.chinese: 你知不知道，杰克上个月离婚了。
conversations.reply_english: For what reason.是什么原因导致的呢？
conversations.reply_chinese: 是什么原因导致的呢？

title: 我永远不会忘记我的初恋情人

conversations.english: I will never forget Linda. After all, she was my first lover.我永远不会忘记琳达。毕竟，她是我的初恋情人。
conversations.chinese: 我永远不会忘记琳达。毕竟，她是我的初恋情人。
conversations.reply_english: I think you’ll lay it to rest with the time flying.我想随着时间的流逝，你会慢慢忘记这件事情的。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我想随着时间的流逝，你会慢慢忘记这件事情的。

conversations.english: Tom and Helen got married at last.Tom和Helen终于结婚了。
conversations.chinese: Tom和Helen终于结婚了。
conversations.reply_english: How did you know that? I heart Tom’s father didn’t agree with that.你怎么知道的？我听说Tom的父亲不同意他们的婚事。
conversations.reply_chinese: 你怎么知道的？我听说Tom的父亲不同意他们的婚事。

conversations.english: Why do you want to eat western food so much today? Anything special to celebrate? Did you get a promotion?为什么你今天那么想来吃西餐啊？有什么特殊事情要庆祝吗？是不是你获得晋升了？
conversations.chinese: 为什么你今天那么想来吃西餐啊？有什么特殊事情要庆祝吗？是不是你获得晋升了？
conversations.reply_english: Honey, you really forgot about it? Think it over. It's a candlelight dinner.亲爱的，你真忘了今天是什么日子了吗？好好想想。这可是烛光晚餐啊。
conversations.reply_chinese: 亲爱的，你真忘了今天是什么日子了吗？好好想想。这可是烛光晚餐啊。

title: 如何追自己喜欢的女孩

conversations.english: how's it going?最近怎么样？
conversations.chinese: 最近怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: I'm in a good mood today, actually. How about you?事实上，我今天心情很好，你呢？
conversations.reply_chinese: 事实上，我今天心情很好，你呢？

title: 最近在看中国式离婚这部电视剧

conversations.english: hi, how are you doing?嗨，过得好吗？
conversations.chinese: 嗨，过得好吗？
conversations.reply_english: everything's great. And you?挺好的，你呢？
conversations.reply_chinese: 挺好的，你呢？

title: 你会嫁给一个外国人吗

conversations.english: if you can choose, will you marry a foreigner or a Chinese?如果让你选的话，你是愿意嫁给一个中国人还是一个外国人？
conversations.chinese: 如果让你选的话，你是愿意嫁给一个中国人还是一个外国人？
conversations.reply_english: why? Did tom pop the question?为什么这么问，汤姆向你求婚了吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 为什么这么问，汤姆向你求婚了吗？

title: 我爱你但我不能和你一起走

conversations.english: Veronica， wait! Come on， honey, get back in the car. Let’s talk it over, okay?Veronica，等一下！亲爱的，过来，进到车里来。我们仔细讨论下这件事，行吗？
conversations.chinese: Veronica，等一下！亲爱的，过来，进到车里来。我们仔细讨论下这件事，行吗？
conversations.reply_english: No! I’m tired of your lies! I don’t know who you are anymore!不！我厌倦了你的谎言。我不再认识你。
conversations.reply_chinese: 不！我厌倦了你的谎言。我不再认识你。

title: 这是你们第一次约会吗

conversations.english: You are dressed to kill. You look gorgeous, Alexander.盛装打扮啊！亚历山大，你看上去帅呆了！
conversations.chinese: 盛装打扮啊！亚历山大，你看上去帅呆了！
conversations.reply_english: Thanks. This is my power suit. I have a dinner date tonight.谢谢，这是我的权力套装,我今晚有约。
conversations.reply_chinese: 谢谢，这是我的权力套装,我今晚有约。

conversations.english: Jack and Mary broke up.杰克和玛丽分手了。
conversations.chinese: 杰克和玛丽分手了。
conversations.reply_english: It’s so sad. They had been together for only two months. Do you know what the matter was?真可惜。他们在一起只有两个月。你知道怎么回事吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 真可惜。他们在一起只有两个月。你知道怎么回事吗？

conversations.english: Hello, Deva, how are you?嗨，迪娃，你好吗？
conversations.chinese: 嗨，迪娃，你好吗？
conversations.reply_english: Can't complain. What about you?还行吧，你呢？
conversations.reply_chinese: 还行吧，你呢？

title: 你是一个幸福的丈夫吗

conversations.english: Are you a happy married man?你是一个幸福的丈夫吗？
conversations.chinese: 你是一个幸福的丈夫吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I am. My wife and I understand each other.是的，我是。我和我老婆都能相互理解。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我是。我和我老婆都能相互理解。

conversations.english: I wonder what he looks like. Oh, I can't wait to see him! His email said he'd be wearing a white hat.oh, there he is.我真想知道他长得什么样，真想马上见到他。他在电子邮件里说他会戴白帽子。(四下张望)啊，他在那儿。
conversations.chinese: 我真想知道他长得什么样，真想马上见到他。他在电子邮件里说他会戴白帽子。(四下张望)啊，他在那儿。
conversations.reply_english: Hey, Isabelle…嗨，伊莎贝拉…
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗨，伊莎贝拉…

conversations.english: Hi, Mary. I haven't seen you in ages! I heard that you and Daniel are getting married on August 8th, the opening day of the 2008 Olympic Games. Is it true?嗨，玛丽，好久不见！听说你和丹尼尔打算8月8日，也就是2008年奥运会的第一天结婚，是真的吗？
conversations.chinese: 嗨，玛丽，好久不见！听说你和丹尼尔打算8月8日，也就是2008年奥运会的第一天结婚，是真的吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, it is. We've been dating for over 7 years. We have decided to get married on a special day and we think August 8th, 2008 is a red-letter day.是的，我们已经谈了7年恋爱，决定选个特殊的日子结婚。2008年8月8日正是个好日子。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我们已经谈了7年恋爱，决定选个特殊的日子结婚。2008年8月8日正是个好日子。

conversations.english: Hey, Mary, what's up?嗯,玛丽,最近怎么样?
conversations.chinese: 嗯,玛丽,最近怎么样?
conversations.reply_english: Not much. Last night I met this great guy at the bar and we had such a wonderful time that we decided to meet again tonight.还行吧,昨天晚上在酒吧里遇到一个特别好的人,我们玩得非常开心,于是决定今天晚上再见一面.
conversations.reply_chinese: 还行吧,昨天晚上在酒吧里遇到一个特别好的人,我们玩得非常开心,于是决定今天晚上再见一面.

conversations.english: So how long have you known Mary?那你认识玛丽多久了？
conversations.chinese: 那你认识玛丽多久了？
conversations.reply_english: Only four days.只四天。
conversations.reply_chinese: 只四天。

title: 她丈夫是商业大亨很有钱

conversations.english: I hear Jean married a business tycoon.我听说简嫁给一位商业大亨。
conversations.chinese: 我听说简嫁给一位商业大亨。
conversations.reply_english: That's true. Her husband is a fat cat.没错。她的丈夫很有钱。
conversations.reply_chinese: 没错。她的丈夫很有钱。

conversations.english: Hi, Mike. We're having a party tonight, wanna come join us? You can bring your girlfriend.嘿，麦克。我们今晚有个派对，你想加入我们吗？你可以带你的女朋友一起来。
conversations.chinese: 嘿，麦克。我们今晚有个派对，你想加入我们吗？你可以带你的女朋友一起来。
conversations.reply_english: Well. I am breaking up with Cathy.额，我想和Cathy分手了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 额，我想和Cathy分手了。

title: 我女朋友刚刚抛弃我了

conversations.english: Hi, Is that David?喂，你是大卫吗？
conversations.chinese: 喂，你是大卫吗？
conversations.reply_english: Hi, Jenny. It's David here.喂，珍妮。我是大卫。
conversations.reply_chinese: 喂，珍妮。我是大卫。

conversations.english: hey, Lily, what are you doing?嗨，莉莉，你在干什么呢？
conversations.chinese: 嗨，莉莉，你在干什么呢？
conversations.reply_english: waiting for someone.等某人现身呢。
conversations.reply_chinese: 等某人现身呢。

conversations.english: What's the problem, Nada? You look down in the dumps.娜达,怎么了？你看上去怎么闷闷不乐的？
conversations.chinese: 娜达,怎么了？你看上去怎么闷闷不乐的？
conversations.reply_english: I don't know. My life is a big mess. Everything is so compliceted.我也不知道。我的生活一团糟。怎么这么复杂？
conversations.reply_chinese: 我也不知道。我的生活一团糟。怎么这么复杂？

conversations.english: More and more Chinese are marrying foreigners.越来越多的中国人嫁给了外国人。
conversations.chinese: 越来越多的中国人嫁给了外国人。
conversations.reply_english: That's true. But I have a low opinion of those women who go out with foreigners.是啊，但是我挺鄙视那些和外国人在一起的女人的。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊，但是我挺鄙视那些和外国人在一起的女人的。

title: 给亲密的朋友挑选分别礼物

conversations.english: Jessica is going back to Holland next week. I've been thinking a lot about what to give her as a parting gift, but I still have no clue.杰西卡下周就要会荷兰了,我一直在想该选个东西作为分别的礼物,但是还没有头绪.
conversations.chinese: 杰西卡下周就要会荷兰了,我一直在想该选个东西作为分别的礼物,但是还没有头绪.
conversations.reply_english: is that the girl you spent almost every weekend with?是那个你哦几乎每周都和她在一起的女孩吗?
conversations.reply_chinese: 是那个你哦几乎每周都和她在一起的女孩吗?

conversations.english: I can't bear you anymore. I am sick of your drinking. I am divorcing you.我再也不能忍受了。我讨厌你喝酒。我要和你离婚。
conversations.chinese: 我再也不能忍受了。我讨厌你喝酒。我要和你离婚。
conversations.reply_english: Don't do that to me, honey. Give me a chance, please. I make a solemn promise never to drink alcohol again.亲爱的，不要这样对我。请给我一次机会。我郑重承诺，我不会再喝酒了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 亲爱的，不要这样对我。请给我一次机会。我郑重承诺，我不会再喝酒了。

title: 我听说你和约翰在约会

conversations.english: I heard you are going out with John?我听说你和约翰在约会？
conversations.chinese: 我听说你和约翰在约会？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. To be frank, I really love him to death.是的。坦白告诉你，我爱死他了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。坦白告诉你，我爱死他了。

conversations.english: Hey, Jenny. Would you like to go to dinner with me?嘿，珍妮。你想和我一起吃晚餐吗？
conversations.chinese: 嘿，珍妮。你想和我一起吃晚餐吗？
conversations.reply_english: I don't know. You know what they say about office romances.我不知道。你知道他们怎么说办公室恋情吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 我不知道。你知道他们怎么说办公室恋情吗？

conversations.english: Hey, Jack! Is Jenny coming with us?嘿，杰克！珍妮和我们一起去吗？
conversations.chinese: 嘿，杰克！珍妮和我们一起去吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. Why?是的。怎么啦？
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。怎么啦？

conversations.english: Hi, Mike. Haven't seen you for a while. How's Cathy?嘿，麦克。好久不见。卡西怎么样？
conversations.chinese: 嘿，麦克。好久不见。卡西怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: We are not seeing each other any more.我们不会再见面了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们不会再见面了。

title: 你和约翰的约会怎么样

conversations.english: Mary, how was your date with john?玛丽,你和约翰的约会怎么样?
conversations.chinese: 玛丽,你和约翰的约会怎么样?
conversations.reply_english: it's ok. It seems we have a lot in common.还可以.我们好像很投缘.
conversations.reply_chinese: 还可以.我们好像很投缘.

conversations.english: What upsets you?什么事让你这么苦恼？
conversations.chinese: 什么事让你这么苦恼？
conversations.reply_english: My parents called. As usual, they reminded me again that I should have a plan to marry by my late 20s.Easier set than done. Who should I marry? I have no time to go on a date.说来容易做来难。我父母的电话。像往常一样，他们又提醒我，我应该计划在30岁之前结婚。我应该跟谁结婚？我都没有时间去约会。
conversations.reply_chinese: 说来容易做来难。我父母的电话。像往常一样，他们又提醒我，我应该计划在30岁之前结婚。我应该跟谁结婚？我都没有时间去约会。

conversations.english: I just meant that she's got different taste.我只是说她的品味不一样。
conversations.chinese: 我只是说她的品味不一样。
conversations.reply_english: What kind of girl is she?她是哪种女孩？
conversations.reply_chinese: 她是哪种女孩？

conversations.english: ...I knew it. I always knew you were a lesbian!……我就知道。我就知道妳是女同志！
conversations.chinese: ……我就知道。我就知道妳是女同志！
conversations.reply_english: She's my roommate, not my date. [to Yi-jun] The D-man, as in dork.她是我室友，不是我的交往对象。（对怡君）这位是竹本君，竹本就是愚笨的笨。
conversations.reply_chinese: 她是我室友，不是我的交往对象。（对怡君）这位是竹本君，竹本就是愚笨的笨。

title: 她是4个孩子的妈妈气色还那么好

conversations.english: Is that true?那是真的吗？
conversations.chinese: 那是真的吗？
conversations.reply_english: I guess so. Now Anna's got four kids and another on the way.我想是吧。安娜已经生四个了，现在肚子里还有一个。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我想是吧。安娜已经生四个了，现在肚子里还有一个。

title: 我们的爱情故事比电影还要动人

conversations.english: Ghost will be on at six thirty. It's already six fifteen now. Hurry up.人鬼情未了将在六点半开演。现在已经六点十五了，快点啊。
conversations.chinese: 人鬼情未了将在六点半开演。现在已经六点十五了，快点啊。
conversations.reply_english: You'd been hanging around before left home. Well, now, you are urging me for the movie. This has been fun!你在家磨磨蹭蹭的。现在有为了赶电影一直催我。真有意思！
conversations.reply_chinese: 你在家磨磨蹭蹭的。现在有为了赶电影一直催我。真有意思！

title: 她未婚先孕无药可救了

conversations.english: Who's that?那是谁？
conversations.chinese: 那是谁？
conversations.reply_english: Saint Jude-he's the saint of lost causes. Like my cousin, Anna, who can't stop getting pregnant. She's a lost cause.圣犹大——他是个守护无法自拔者的圣徒。好比我表妹安娜一直在怀孕。她根本无药可救了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 圣犹大——他是个守护无法自拔者的圣徒。好比我表妹安娜一直在怀孕。她根本无药可救了。

conversations.english: Joanne, let’s not make this divorce any more acrimonious than it already is, okay? Let’s just get down to business and start dividing this stuff up fairly, so we can go our separate ways, alright?Joanne, 让我们的离婚别再雪上加霜了，好吗？我们来谈正经事吧，把财产公平地分了啊，然后我们分道扬镳，好吗？
conversations.chinese: Joanne, 让我们的离婚别再雪上加霜了，好吗？我们来谈正经事吧，把财产公平地分了啊，然后我们分道扬镳，好吗？
conversations.reply_english: Fine with me. I just want to get this over with. It’s important we make a clean break. I should have signed a pre-nup.我没问题，我只是想讲清楚。我们一刀两断是件大事。我真应该签一份婚前财产协议。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我没问题，我只是想讲清楚。我们一刀两断是件大事。我真应该签一份婚前财产协议。

title: 你们分手对孩子是场灾难

conversations.english: What will happen to the children if you break up?如果你们分手了，孩子们怎么办？
conversations.chinese: 如果你们分手了，孩子们怎么办？
conversations.reply_english: That's a relief for me and a misery for the children.对我来说这是解脱，对孩子来说是一场灾难。
conversations.reply_chinese: 对我来说这是解脱，对孩子来说是一场灾难。

conversations.english: You seem to like her very much, don't you?你好像很喜欢她，是不是？
conversations.chinese: 你好像很喜欢她，是不是？
conversations.reply_english: I can't deny that. She is so beautiful that I fell in love with her at the first sight. I wish I knew more about her.我承认。我对他一见钟情，我希望我能多了解她的一些情况。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我承认。我对他一见钟情，我希望我能多了解她的一些情况。

conversations.english: You married Joe, didn't you?你和Joe结婚了吧？
conversations.chinese: 你和Joe结婚了吧？
conversations.reply_english: Joe? I don't know what you mean.我不知道你在说什么。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我不知道你在说什么。

conversations.english: So, where are you going to spend your winter vacation?那么，你准备去哪里度寒假？
conversations.chinese: 那么，你准备去哪里度寒假？
conversations.reply_english: Oh, I’m going to meet my girlfriend in Thailand.噢，我准备去泰国见我的女朋友。
conversations.reply_chinese: 噢，我准备去泰国见我的女朋友。

conversations.english: Trina, will you marry me?Trina,你愿意嫁给我吗？
conversations.chinese: Trina,你愿意嫁给我吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes! Yes! And yes! Jared ,of course I’ll marry you!愿意，我愿意。Jared,我会嫁给你。
conversations.reply_chinese: 愿意，我愿意。Jared,我会嫁给你。

conversations.english: Man, I’m freaking out! You gotta help me!我要崩溃了,你得帮帮我.
conversations.chinese: 我要崩溃了,你得帮帮我.
conversations.reply_english: Whoa, whoa, take it easy, relax. Geez, you’re sweating like a pig! What’s going on?别紧张,放松。Geez，你出了很多汗。怎么了？
conversations.reply_chinese: 别紧张,放松。Geez，你出了很多汗。怎么了？

conversations.english: How time flies!时间过得真快!
conversations.chinese: 时间过得真快!
conversations.reply_english: May and Danny have already grown up.阿美和丹丹都已经长大了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 阿美和丹丹都已经长大了。

conversations.english: They got a divorce at last.他们最终还是离婚了。
conversations.chinese: 他们最终还是离婚了。
conversations.reply_english: It's inenvitable. Their love wasbuilt on the sand, and this is why their marriage has landed on the rocks.这是不可避免的，他们的爱情缺乏坚实的基础，这就是他们是婚姻频临破裂的原因所在。
conversations.reply_chinese: 这是不可避免的，他们的爱情缺乏坚实的基础，这就是他们是婚姻频临破裂的原因所在。

conversations.english: What will you do now? Propose to her.你现在怎么办？向她求婚吗？
conversations.chinese: 你现在怎么办？向她求婚吗？
conversations.reply_english: Of course I won't chill out. Opportunity knocks only once.我当然不会罢手的，几乎难得嘛。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我当然不会罢手的，几乎难得嘛。

conversations.english: John hasn't got married up to now.约翰迄今为止还未结婚了。
conversations.chinese: 约翰迄今为止还未结婚了。
conversations.reply_english: Don't you know that he has been carrying a torch for Mary for years?难道你不知道他这么多年来一直单恋着玛丽吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 难道你不知道他这么多年来一直单恋着玛丽吗？

title: 去浏览下网上的征婚启事

conversations.english: This has got to stop! Another Friday night without a date! What can I do?不能再这样下去了！又一个星期五的晚上没有约会! 我怎么办？
conversations.chinese: 不能再这样下去了！又一个星期五的晚上没有约会! 我怎么办？
conversations.reply_english: What about looking through the personal ads on the Internet? That’s how I met Steven.去网上浏览一下征婚启事怎么样？我就是这样认识斯蒂芬的。
conversations.reply_chinese: 去网上浏览一下征婚启事怎么样？我就是这样认识斯蒂芬的。

title: 丈夫不忠我要和他离婚

conversations.english: What's the matter, Lisa? You don't look too good.什么事，丽莎？你看上去不高兴。
conversations.chinese: 什么事，丽莎？你看上去不高兴。
conversations.reply_english: I just found out that my husband is cheating on me.我刚发现我丈夫对我不忠。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我刚发现我丈夫对我不忠。

conversations.english: I think I'm going to China this vacation.How about you?我想这个假期去中国，你呢？
conversations.chinese: 我想这个假期去中国，你呢？
conversations.reply_english: Me?I prefer France.我？我要去法国。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我？我要去法国。

conversations.english: Are you in favor of having a trip during the spring break?你赞成春假旅游吗？
conversations.chinese: 你赞成春假旅游吗？
conversations.reply_english: This is just what I have in mind.Where are you planning to go?这正是我所想的.你打算去哪儿？
conversations.reply_chinese: 这正是我所想的.你打算去哪儿？

conversations.english: Is this Mr.Smith's residence?这是史密斯先生的寓所吗？
conversations.chinese: 这是史密斯先生的寓所吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes,it is.是的。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。

conversations.english: I'm going on a cruise this summer.今年夏天我要去做一次海上旅行。
conversations.chinese: 今年夏天我要去做一次海上旅行。
conversations.reply_english: No kidding?真的吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 真的吗？

conversations.english: Helen, did you hear I’m having a party? Next Saturday in my place.海伦，你有听说我要办个舞会吗？下星期六在我家。
conversations.chinese: 海伦，你有听说我要办个舞会吗？下星期六在我家。
conversations.reply_english: I may have something on that day, but thanks for inviting me.那天我可能有别的事，但是还是谢谢你邀请我。
conversations.reply_chinese: 那天我可能有别的事，但是还是谢谢你邀请我。

conversations.english: Oh, George, what a beautiful day it is today! The sun is hot and there are just a few clouds scattered here and there! What a perfect day to be at the beach! The kids are going to have so much fun! And we’ll be able to relax in the sun while they’re playing.乔治，多好的天啊！阳光充足，只有些散落的云。这是去海滩的好日子。孩子们会有很多乐趣。当他们玩时，我们也能晒下阳光放松下。
conversations.chinese: 乔治，多好的天啊！阳光充足，只有些散落的云。这是去海滩的好日子。孩子们会有很多乐趣。当他们玩时，我们也能晒下阳光放松下。
conversations.reply_english: It does seem like the perfect day! I’m glad we chose to get out of the city and enjoy the nice weather! This looks like the perfect spot! Ok kids, put on your sunscreen while your mom and I set up camp. Here, Mary, help me lay down these beach towels.看上去确实是个晴天。我很高兴我们选择住在城外并能享受到好天气。这儿看上去是个完美的地方。孩子们，涂些防晒油，你们的妈妈和我搭建帐篷。玛丽，过来，帮我将这些海滩手巾放好。
conversations.reply_chinese: 看上去确实是个晴天。我很高兴我们选择住在城外并能享受到好天气。这儿看上去是个完美的地方。孩子们，涂些防晒油，你们的妈妈和我搭建帐篷。玛丽，过来，帮我将这些海滩手巾放好。
